snippet: A burglary defendant in Fresno who was freed because a jury mistakenly signed a not-guilty form in his trial on Wednesday was killed a few hours later in a fight.
abstract: Bobby Lee Pearson, burglary defendant in Fresno, Calif, who was freed because jury mistakenly signed not-guilty form in his trial, is killed hours later in a fight.
lead_paragraph: A burglary defendant in Fresno who was freed because a jury mistakenly signed a not-guilty form in his trial on Wednesday was killed a few hours later in a fight.

headline.main: California: Mistakenly Acquitted, Defendant Is Killed Soon After
headline.print_headline: California: Mistakenly Acquitted, Defendant Is Killed Soon After
